api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

id.description: ID of the User Group to edit. Example: 4

limit_campaign_type.description: Campaign sending limit by type. Examples: 'day', 'week', 'month', 'month1st', 'monthcdate', 'year', 'ever'

limit_mail_type.description: Email sending limit by type. Examples: 'day', 'week', 'month', 'month1st', 'monthcdate', 'year', 'ever'

pg_form_edit.description: Permission for editing subscription forms. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_list_add.description: Permission for adding lists. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_list_bounce.description: Permission for accessing list bounce settings. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_list_delete.description: Permission for deleting lists. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_list_edit.description: Permission for editing lists. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_list_emailaccount.description: Permission for managing Unsubscribe By Email. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_list_headers.description: Permission for managing custom email headers. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_message_add.description: Permission for adding messages. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_message_delete.description: Permission for deleting messages. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_message_edit.description: Permission for editing messages. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_message_send.description: Permission for sending messages. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_reports_campaign.description: Permission for accessing Campaign Reports. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_reports_list.description: Permission for accessing List Reports. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_reports_trend.description: Permission for accessing Report trends. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_reports_user.description: Permission for accessing User Reports. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_add.description: Permission for adding contacts. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_approve.description: Permission for approving contacts. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_delete.description: Permission for deleting contacts. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_edit.description: Permission for editing contacts. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_export.description: Permission for exporting contacts. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_fields.description: Permission for managing contact custom fields. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_filters.description: Permission for managing contact list segments. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_import.description: Permission for importing contacts. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_subscriber_sync.description: Permission for syncing contacts. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_template_add.description: Permission for adding templates. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_template_delete.description: Permission for deleting templates. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_template_edit.description: Permission for editing templates. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_user_add.description: Permission for adding users. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_user_delete.description: Permission for deleting users. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

pg_user_edit.description: Permission for editing users. Example: 1 = yes, 0 = no

title.description: Name of the group. Example: 'Group Title'
